name: strong
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Premium Leather : Extra-thick, professional-grade leather for long-lasting durability & a soft, consistent bat feel
2X Durability : Engineered to outlast standard gloves, perfect for high-rep training & game use
Micro-Perforations : Ultra-fine ventilation holes in the palm enhance breathability & moisture control
Seamless Palm : Patch-free palm design ensures a smooth, bunch-free grip for better bat control
Powerstrap Closure : Lock-in fit with a secure tab system that delivers reinforced wrist support
360° Long Cuff : 50mm extra-tall wrist wrap provides unmatched stability & reduces fatigue
Pro-Inspired Design : Developed with input from Franklin’s MLB pros for elite performance & reliability
